title: Organizational Learning and Leadership: Strategies for Building a Collaborative Learning Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learners are organizational leaders or managers in scientific fields, capable of digital device-enabled collaboration. Developing solutions applicable to real organizational problems through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core leadership elements for fostering a learning culture within an organization.
Learners can design and implement practical strategies for building a collaborative learning environment.
Learners can develop a framework for critically evaluating the role of leaders in organizational learning processes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
